flavorText: She wished for nobility, but not for a nation to honor it.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie wünschte sich eine Krone, vergaß aber das dazugehörige Volk.
foreignData.name: Goldener Wunsch
foreignData.text: Bestimme eine Artefakt- oder Verzauberungskarte außerhalb des Spiels, die du besitzt, zeige sie offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Entferne den Goldenen Wunsch ganz aus dem Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Ella deseó nobleza, pero no una nación que la honrara.
foreignData.name: Deseo dorado
foreignData.text: Elige una carta tuya de artefacto o de encantamiento que esté fuera del juego, muestra esa carta y ponla en tu mano. Remueve del juego el Deseo dorado.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle souhaita la noblesse, mais sans nation pour l'honorer.
foreignData.name: Souhait doré
foreignData.text: Choisissez une carte d'artefact ou d'enchantement que vous possédez en dehors de la partie, révélez cette carte et mettez-la dans votre main. Retirez le Souhait doré de la partie.

foreignData.flavorText: Desiderò la nobiltà, ma non una nazione per onorarla.
foreignData.name: Desiderio Dorato
foreignData.text: Scegli una carta artefatto o incantesimo che possiedi e che non fa parte della partita, rivela quella carta e aggiungila alla tua mano. Rimuovi dal gioco il Desiderio Dorato.

foreignData.flavorText: Ela desejou nobreza, mas não uma nação para honrá-la.
foreignData.name: Desejo Dourado
foreignData.text: Escolha um card seu de artefato ou de encantamento que esteja fora do jogo, revele aquele card e coloque-o em sua mão. Remova Desejo Dourado de jogo.

name: Golden Wish
originalText: Choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Golden Wish from the game.

rulings.text: Can’t acquire the Ante cards. They are considered still “in the game” as are cards in the library and the graveyard.
Can’t acquire cards that are phased out.
You can’t acquire exiled cards because those cards are still in one of the game’s zones.
In a sanctioned event, a card that’s “outside the game” is one that’s in your sideboard. In an unsanctioned event, you may choose any card from your collection.

text: You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Golden Wish.
